short_summary: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services
description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
duration_in_months: No date provided for expected Contract End Date
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Temporary Help Services

## Contract Information

* **Reference Number:** CB-793-70262427
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** S4868856
* **Publication Date:** March 21, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 27, 2024, 14:30:00
* **Goods or Services:** Temporary personnel services

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Variations or combinations of the above methods
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defense
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ Address Line: 60 Moodie Drive
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K2H 8G1
	+ Country: Canada

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services to support its operations. This requirement is open only to suppliers who are qualified under the streams and categories listed below:

* Streams: 13.11 Strategist
* Categories: EN578-172870

Invited suppliers include:

* A Hundred Answers Inc.
* ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC., in Joint Venture
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* Colliers Project Leaders Inc.
* CSI Consulting Inc.
* DLS Technology Corporation
* EXPERIS CANADA INC.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
* OXARO INC.
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.

The required level of security is Secret. Interested suppliers should review the Request for Proposal document for more information on the requirements and the evaluation process.

Note:

* The Request for Proposal document can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34543/s4868856-rfp-for-competitive-method-1-right-fit.pdf
